mdx.body:
import Snapshots from './components/Snapshots';

![Top 33 JavaScript Projects on GitHub](assets/01-cover.png)

2021 is coming to its end, and we may do another snapshot of **33 most starred open-sourced JavaScript repositories** on GitHub **as of November 13th, 2021**.

> Previous snapshots: [2018](https://trekhleb.dev/blog/2018/top-33-javascript-projects-on-github-august-2018/), [2020](https://trekhleb.dev/blog/2020/top-33-javascript-projects-on-github-december/).

> You may also [query the GitHub](https://github.com/search?l=&o=desc&q=stars%3A%3E1+language%3AJavaScript&s=stars&type=Repositories) to fetch the latest results.

<Snapshots />

frontmatter.title: Top 33 JavaScript Projects on GitHub (November 2021)
frontmatter.summary: Snapshot of the 33 most starred open-sourced JavaScript repositories on GitHub as of November 2021
